channel.title: Java problem in the sever run.bat can this be locked now it is fixed
channel.description:
okay i have 2 computers and my 64 bit computer it works just fine but on my 32bit xp computer is where all the problems start
[code] @echo off title DeathScape Dementhium 639 java -server -Xmx512m -cp bin;lib/* org.dementhium.RS2ServerBootstrap pause [/code]
now on the 32 bit is said
[code] 'java' is not recognized as an internal or external command, operable program or batch file. Press any key to continue . . . [/code] now is there any help for this iknow there is probly a simple fix but im lost for words atm ive ben up for like 3 strate nights coding and starting to see duble sorry for gramer and spelling

this is resolved dont need any more help with this you can lock this now

item.title: Java problem in the sever run.bat can this be locked now it is fixed
item.dc:creator: @shabba_56 shabba 56
item.description:
@shabba_56 wrote:

your run.bat is wrong

“@echo off
title DeathScape Dementhium 639
java -server -Xmx512m -cp bin;lib/* org.dementhium.RS2ServerBootstrap
pause”

take out the -server so it looks like this

@echo off
title DeathScape Dementhium 639
java -Xmx512m -cp bin;lib/* org.dementhium.RS2ServerBootstrap
pause

Read full topic

okay Level 120 Dungeoneering has got it fixed for me now i want to give him rep but there is no button to do that so if a mod sees this give hi rep please

item.title: Java problem in the sever run.bat can this be locked now it is fixed
item.dc:creator: @Level_120_Dungeoneer Level 120 Dungeoneering
item.description:
@Level_120_Dungeoneer wrote:

[quote=“1airwolf, post:3, topic:435921”]i have jdk on both
and jre on both[/quote]

Then you messed up while installing. Uninstall both, then reinstall it (x32 bit version) then try again. It should work.

Read full topic
